snippet.title: [Galaxy Tales: Story of Rapunzel] Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
"Galaxy Tales: Story of Rapunzel" is a platformer action game depicting the adventures of a cheerful and the extraordinary android ‘Rapunzel’ and ‘Rose’ the alien who is forced to be alongside him. With its adorable and bright colored graphics, anyone can join the adventure and humor.

“Galaxy Tales” is planned to release at 2022 on PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, PC Steam.
